ca.projectTOMi.tomi.service

Class UserAccountService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.projectTOMi.tomi.service.UserAccountService

  • @Service
public final class UserAccountService
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides services for UserAccount objects.
    Version:
    1.3
    Author:
    Karol Talbot

      private void checkAdmins(UserAccount oldUserAccount, UserAccount newUserAccount)

    • Constructor Detail

      • UserAccountService

        @Autowired
public UserAccountService(UserAccountRepository repository,
                                      TeamService teamService,
                                      EntryService entryService,
                                      UserAuthorizationService userAuthorizationService,
                                      TimesheetAuthorizationService timesheetAuthorizationService,
                                      ProjectAuthorizationService projectAuthorizationService,
                                      TOMiEmailService emailService)
        Creates the UserAccountService.
        Parameters:
        repository - Repository responsible for accessing and persisting for UserAccount objects
        teamService - Services for Teams
        entryService - Services for Entries and Timesheets
        userAuthorizationService - Services for updating UserAuthorizationPolicy objects
        timesheetAuthorizationService - Services for updating TimesheetAuthorizationPolicy objects
        projectAuthorizationService - Services for updating ProjectAuthorizationPolicy objects
        emailService - Services for sending email

      • createWeeklyTimesheet

        @Scheduled(cron="0 0 * * * MON")
public void createWeeklyTimesheet()
        Creates a new timesheet every monday at 1am for all active users.

      • createUserAccount

        public UserAccount createUserAccount(UserAccount userAccount)
        Creates a new user as well as creates a timesheet for the current week dated on the previous monday.
        Parameters:
        userAccount - the new UserAccount
        Returns:
        the created and saved userAccount

      • checkAdmins

        private void checkAdmins(UserAccount oldUserAccount,
                         UserAccount newUserAccount)
        Checks the database to ensure there is always at least 1 admin UserAccount and prevents removing admin status from the last admin account.
        Parameters:
        oldUserAccount - UserAccount before modification
        newUserAccount - UserAccount after modification

      • checkProgramDirectors

        private void checkProgramDirectors(UserAccount oldUserAccount,
                                   UserAccount newUserAccount)
        Checks the database to ensure there is always at least 1 program director UserAccount and prevents removing program director status from the last program director account.
        Parameters:
        oldUserAccount - UserAccount before modification
        newUserAccount - UserAccount after modification

      • emailReminder

        @Scheduled(cron="0 0 16 * * FRI")
public void emailReminder()
        Sends an email Reminder to users that have not submitted their Timesheet for the week.

      • createUserPrime

        @EventListener(value=org.springframework.context.event.ContextRefreshedEvent.class)
public void createUserPrime()
        Checks to ensure the UserAccount associated with the application both exists and has the admin status. This prevents the system from being unable to create new users.

      • getUserAccountsByProjects

        java.util.List<UserAccount> getUserAccountsByProjects(Project project)
        Gets a list of UserAccounts working on a project.
        Parameters:
        project - The Project to get a list of UserAccounts for
        Returns:
        List of UserAccounts working on a Project
